The tightrope is an Agility obstacle found within the Falador Rooftop Course. An Agility level of 30 is required to pass the obstacle.

The '''tightrope''' is an [[Agility]] obstacle found within the [[Falador Rooftop Course]]. An Agility level of 30 is required to pass the obstacle.
